Hi Sallie, 
To answer your question,  here is a brief article that discusses event security and the related costs. The author suggest switching to hiring private special event security in order to save money. I hope this article it helpful and that other members will share their experiences with you!
http://icma.org/en/Article/100872/Choosing_and_Using_Contract_Security
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA’s Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
Sallie,
Bullhead City has an annual river float. This year there were 30,000 participants. CSC was hired for event security. (http://www.csc-usa.com/home/) This was the second year in a row we hired CSC. We could not put this event on without their assistance. 
Good luck!

answers.author: Richard Stoney
answers.text:
Hi Sallie, 
With the high cost of police details and the reality that cutting back on security is not an option, private security is fast becoming the norm at special events.  
Hiring the right company will provide the professional, visible deterrent that you want with the cost savings that you need.    
Feel free to contact me directly with any other questions you may have. rstoney@smssi.com
